suite.name: New Booking

test.name: Create A New Booking

kw.name: Open Browser to Landing Page
kw.doc: A general startup keyword for opening a browser to the landing page.

kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.

kw.name: Set Browser Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout used by most input and getter keywords.

kw.name: New Context
kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options.
kw.msg: { "acceptDownloads": true, "bypassCSP": false, "forcedColors": "none", "hideRfBrowser": false, "ignoreHTTPSErrors": false, "javaScriptEnabled": true, "offline": false, "reducedMotion": "no-preference", "viewport": { "width": 1280, "height": 720 }, "deprecated_pos_args": [] }

{'acceptDownloads': True, 'bypassCSP': False, 'forcedColors': 'none', 'hideRfBrowser': False, 'ignoreHTTPSErrors': False, 'javaScriptEnabled': True, 'offline': False, 'reducedMotion': 'no-preference', 'viewport': {'width': 1280, 'height': 720}, 'deprecated_pos_args': []}

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://test4.omenahotels.com/

kw.name: Set Viewport Size
kw.doc: Sets current Pages viewport size to specified dimensions.

kw.name: Wait Until Network Is Idle
kw.doc: Waits until there has been at least one instance of 500 ms of no network traffic on the page after loading.

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.
kw.msg: Title: 'Cheap hotels in Helsinki and Finland | Omena Hotels - Budget hotels in Finland'

kw.name: Allow Cookies
kw.doc: Allow Cookies/Toggle Cookie allowance

kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.
